subject: RE: [junit] Junit 3.8 - when ?
msgSnippet: ... I m interested to know the answer.  A month or more ago, we were asked to grab the latest from CVS in the interest of testing the work on 3.8. I and others
messageBody:
Kirill Maximov wrote:
>
> I'm just curious - when jutit 3.8 will be released?

I'm interested to know the answer. A month or more ago, we were asked
to grab the latest from CVS in the interest of testing the work on 3.8.
I and others noted a few failed unit tests, but we haven't heard any
more about 3.8 since then. So, what's the latest news about it?

Thanks,
Craig
